post_title: FS: SGC graded Waddell throwing - SOLD
post_content:
Had planned to cross these over to PSA, and then caught a break and acquired examples in PSA slabs, so making these available. Price includes tracked shipping. Will consider offers…..

Thanks for looking!
Jeff

$SOLD Waddell throwing SGC 4
